title: Deviant Immortal of Uncanny Dao - Novel Updates
tags: Bestiality   Dao Comprehension   Dark   Immortals   Male Protagonist   Mysterious Illness   Mythology   Psychopaths   Transmigration
author: The Pen Of Foxtail   狐尾的笔
description:
The uncanny Dao of heaven, the abnormal immortal and buddha, is it true? Is it false? Lost in confusion, Li Huowang can not distinguish.

However, it wasn’t just these that he cannot distinguish, but also himself. He’s sick. He’s very sick.>
